body: Delusional bastard aint he?
Let me guess, dude will somehow find out that her and teach are dating then blackmail her like “if you don’t want teach to find out what happened then do this”
Oh if your wondering why amuro (the girl) just said please stop and not make a stuff, its because she thought it was sensei
Fucking delusional lmao
I don’t even care about the protagonists anymore. I just want to see Kise suffer as much as possible

HOW COULD I FORGET, there is also the possibility of sensei cheating on Amuro! If sensei is so done with  the shit hes going through with Amuro, he might just fuck that AV manager girl or Miss Hori or even Amuro's friend lol...

So I've been reading this again since the last time I saw it, it had only 2 chapters translated. Reading this made me realize, there can only be 2 scenarios for this; either Amuro is really a cheating woman or Suma-sensei's level of anxiety is so high that it turns into delusions. As for this chapter, Kise is an obsessive kid, he says "Amuro is mine" YEP. Kise thinks he's a boss but really he's a retard. Miss Hori saw what Kise was doing, probably gonna do something about it, but there is a possibility she won't. The masks are a huge thing in the plot, if I'm not mistaken, sensei is also wearing one; that means Kise could wear sensei's mask and fuck Amuro, probably say sensei's name while in the midst of it, resulting into NTR but for Kise lol.

I don't know if what the other teacher(female teacher) saw was Suma-sensei touching hands with Amuro or Kise feeling the ass of Amuro. Either way, at least we have witness if Kise tries to rape or do some shit to Amuro. Lol
This girl so dumb she didn't realise the hand came from the other side even tho the dude rubbed his hand on her side cheek first.
Bro the anxiety 😂😂

Oh yeah, finally a full hint for NTR after introducing the "villain"

I would be surprised if the guy got caught then his whole reputation are ruined rather than him succeeding
And the theme is horror,,,so Kise will surely fuck/rape amuro here...bec it's horror so it's dark, screaming everywhere, plus her position 🐕‍🦺, and the festival 2/3 days.... ,,,,
After reading it again(ch9) sensei is also doing it.....

I forgot this series was a thing. So after catching up, they never did explain what happened at the end of chapter 6? Seeing as they're doing some horror related theme., I guarantee that this dude is going to steal the teacher's mask and pull a bamboozle. The author is definitely playing mind games with the reader into being used to "ntr elements" so they won't hate the girl. Who knows how long does will be milked for.

This slow burn is irritating lol, like the writing is so in your face that it just doesn't work. The only real "twist" would be no ntr and even then because of the writing it wouldnt be that much of a twist. Whatever happens it's gonna feel meh

Heh, what if, the story ends with a vanilla wholesome ending, and 1 or 2 years later makes a ntr after story. I'd laugh so much if they actually give people their happy ending only to take it back later.

Soon, will it turn NTR or will it continue being vanilla. We'll find out soon enough. Even though i don't actually read it just scroll, i keep coming back just to find out if it goes ntr or not, after coming back so many times i can't stop now. I want to see what happens.

Oh I'm so right, she thought it was the teacher as he's right next to her and its not, she'll say how hot it was to grab her ass and he'll over react and start thinking she's cheating on him and snap revealing things.

This is after this guy has found out she's fucking the teacher and tries to kill/rape her and she's vulnerable and scared and when he overreacts it'll crush her. She'll rush to chad and get "comforted" by him only to be dumped after it and the message'll be "trust people"

He's fucking with us, he's doing it deliberately because we've been shitting on him for NTR for years. its a masterful troll
